text: Micaela Flores Amaya (1938 – 3 January 2025), better known by the stage name La Chunga, was a Spanish flamenco dancer, actress and painter. Her art was known as naïf art.Encyclopedia of Women in Today's World, Volume 1, ed. by Mary Zeiss Stange, Carol K. Oyster, and Jane E. Sloan, SAGE Publications (2013) She was also an actress who appeared in Tip on a Dead Jockey (1957) and Vampire in Venice (1988). La Chunga died on 3 January 2025, at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Spanish movie actors Category:Spanish dancers Category:Spanish painters Category:People from Marseille
title: La Chunga
